product_name: MorpheLip Filter Hydroplump Soft Matte Lipstick
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganTreat lips to a softly plumped look, gently hydrated feel, and flawlessly filtered finish with the Morphe Lip Filter Hydroplump Soft Matte Lipstick.
details: DetailsFeaturesSilky smooth matte lipstickBuildable, true-to-lip shadesSoft vanilla scentResearch Results100% agreed it glides smoothly and feels weightless on lips100% agreed it has a soft focus finish91% agreed it enhances lip fullness**based on a 35 subject consumer perception studyKey IngredientsPlumping peptideJojoba seed oilMango butterItem 2646197How To UseGlide over lips for effortless application or apply with a brush for a soft, barely there effect. Build color intensity by applying multiple layers.IngredientsDimethicone, Kaolin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Synthetic Wax, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Synthetic Beeswax, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Microcrystalline Wax (Cera Microcristallina, Cire microcristalline), Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), Tribehenin, Water (Aqua, Eau), Ethylhexylglycerin, Sorbitan Isostearate, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Lactic Acid, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Tocopherol, Vanillin. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090).
how_to_use: Glide over lips for effortless application or apply with a brush for a soft, barely there effect. Build color intensity by applying multiple layers.

reviews.headline: I loved this so much I had to go and get another one!
reviews.comments: Love the rich color and the smoothness of this and the long lasting stay color on my lips!

reviews.headline: I need more
reviews.comments: I love this lippie. It is so comfortable. Will be purchasing more colors. Morphe did something here.

reviews.headline: I returned it
reviews.comments: The color I chose I hated…went in to return and get a different color the next day.  When I originally bought it I used my six dollars in points that I had.  So when I returned it, I had the new color in my hand and thought I could just do an exchange……she says "that will be six dollars"…. How is that possible?  Well….because you used your six dollars yesterday and are returning it today, you can't use your six dollars till tomorrow….HOW FRIGGIN BIZARRE IS THAT?  I said then just give me my money back and you just lost a sale because I'm not coming back tomorrow……I think that rule needs to be changed because it's basically stupid, and as I pointed out already, you lost a sale……

reviews.headline: Absolute must have for fall
reviews.comments: I am blonde with hair skin and this color is a must have for the fall.  I love it! The texture is smooth and velvety with a slight drying effect. I workshop day this has a plumping effect bur it does smooth line and cracks in my lips

reviews.headline: I wanted to love it
reviews.comments: Didn't blend well and when clear lip gloss was added it separated badly

reviews.headline: Doesn't Last
reviews.comments: I love Morphe Soulmatte lipstick. I've been wearing it everyday for a year. When this came out I was all in. They feel lighter on my lips and softer but as the day goes on it's drying and doesn't last very long. Stick with Soulmatte it last longer.

reviews.headline: The packaging wasn't great
reviews.comments: I bought this as well as the lip liner. At first, I liked it it was smooth and hydrating. However, when I opened it the second time the lipstick fell off the base. I would definitely recommend a lip liner, but not the lips sticks.

media.headline: Luxury lip product without price tag
I would buy this product again

faceoff_positive.comments:
The Morphe Lip Filter HydroPlump Soft Matte Lipstick Pedal shade is a gorgeous, soft pink that's perfect for a natural look. I usually apply this lipstick on its own for a quick, effortless wash of color, but it also pairs beautifully with a neutral lip liner for a more defined look. What I love about this product is how comfortable it is. The name "HydroPlump" isn't just for show—this lipstick actually feels hydrating on the lips. I've tried so many matte lipsticks that end up feeling dry and emphasizing every little line, but this one glides on smoothly and feels cushiony. The "plumping" effect is subtle and more of a tingle than a sting, which I appreciate. It just makes my lips look a little fuller and smoother. The soft matte finish is also a win; it's not a flat, chalky matte but more of a velvety finish that looks natural and healthy.

However, it's not perfect. While it feels hydrating, the longevity isn't amazing. It's not transfer-proof, so you'll definitely need to reapply after eating or drinking. I find that it fades gracefully, leaving behind a nice stain, but if you're looking for a lipstick that will last all day without touching up, this probably isn't the one. Also, because of its creamy texture, it can sometimes move around a bit, especially on the inner part of my lips, so a little primer or lip liner underneath can help.

Overall, if you're looking for a super comfortable, hydrating, and natural-looking lipstick with a beautiful soft matte finish, this is a great option. Just be prepared for a few touch-ups throughout the day. The shade Petal is a beautiful, versatile color that I'll be reaching for constantly.
faceoff_positive.headline: Plumping Power Meets a Perfect "Your Lips But Better" Shade
